  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wceq(co(c0, csplice, cotp(c2, c4, c6)), co(co(co(c0, cpfx, c2), cconcat, c6), cconcat, co(c0, csubstr, cop(c4, cfv(chash, c0))))))
